body: I like this cuz idols, which are cute, innocent girls, are being defiled by ugly, dirty men and it’s irresistible. Don’t misinterpret that I like ugly bastards, I like girls that are being screwed by ugly bastards. Generally, I just get aroused when cute girls, such as idols, becomes impure.

I fucking hate this author. His art is great, yet not very unique, meaning that I never recognize it's his stories. So I click on the story expecting a great doujin with amazing art, only to be ambushed by braphogs shidding and farting in my face
Amazing art it will be great on full color, the plot is a bit bland but those last lines of text with the diagram elevate the story to another level. 8.5 out 10 great stuff.
